attributes.comment:
Sir,

I would request you to please look into this proposal. This is second time
increase in few year taxing on our income. If USCIS wants to save money it can
take out inefficient 1-800 service. You can yourself try. This service is useless.
Many times I have enquired status of my application. They have no idea of Priority
date and Application date different. They would tell me that I should have got
approval by now. They would raise an enquiry. And result of enquiry is a letter
from USCIS saying I will get approval in six months. Many six months have came
and gone, I am still in que. PLEASE HELP. SOMEONE PLEASE HELP FROM
THIS USCIS MESS.
I have been in GC line for 5 year now. Every year I renew my EAD and
Advance parole. Every time I renew by GC or Advance Parole, I don't get
subsequent date. By subsequent date what I mean is if for 2003, my EAD was
valid from April 23,2003 to April 22,2004. My next EAD validity will be date when I
EAD is approved. My EAD could be approved in Feb,1,2004. So I lose 2-3 months
time when I process my EAD.
It is real mess. I would love to get chance to explain the mess created by USCIS.
It is the person who goes through pain can understand pain.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Rajesh Singh
